items.name: Nevis Peak Canopy Glide
items.short_description: Soar through the lush Nevis Peak rainforest on a thrilling zipline adventure, offering breathtaking panoramic views of the island and the Caribbean Sea.

items.name: Nevis Coral Reef Discovery Hub
items.short_description: Learn about Nevis's vibrant marine life and ongoing conservation efforts. Participate in a guided snorkel or dive tour to explore restored coral reefs.
items.address: Oualie Beach, Saint James Windward, Nevis

items.name: The Garden Plate Eatery
items.short_description: Indulge in exquisite Nevisian cuisine crafted from fresh, locally sourced ingredients harvested directly from their organic gardens. Enjoy stunning views and a tranquil ambiance.
items.address: Newcastle Road, Saint Thomas Lowland, Nevis

items.name: Nevis Heritage Makers Square
items.short_description: Discover unique handcrafted souvenirs, local art, and traditional Nevisian crafts from a vibrant community of island artisans. Enjoy live music and cultural performances on weekends.

items.name: Serenity Springs Nevis
items.short_description: Rejuvenate your mind and body at this tranquil wellness center offering daily yoga classes, meditation sessions, and holistic spa treatments amidst lush tropical gardens.

items.name: Sugar Mill Rum Legacy
items.short_description: Delve into Nevis's rich history of sugar and rum production with an interactive tour of a modern micro-distillery, followed by guided tastings of premium small-batch rums.
items.address: Fothergills Estate, Saint John Figtree, Nevis

items.name: Nevis Night Sky Sanctuary
items.short_description: Escape light pollution and marvel at the dazzling Caribbean night sky through high-powered telescopes. Guided sessions reveal constellations, planets, and distant galaxies.
items.address: Peak View, St. John Figtree, Nevis

items.name: Eden's Bloom Gardens & Art
items.short_description: Wander through exquisitely designed botanical gardens showcasing Nevis's native flora, interspersed with captivating sculptures from local and international artists.
items.address: Paradise Estate, Saint Thomas Lowland, Nevis

items.name: Nevis Adventure Cycle Park
items.short_description: Explore challenging and scenic mountain biking trails catering to all skill levels, winding through lush landscapes and offering panoramic island vistas. Bike rentals available.

items.name: Sunshine Splash Zone
items.short_description: A family-friendly haven featuring water slides, splash pads, and safe play areas designed for children of all ages, offering a refreshing break from the sun.
